sub-events.comment: Ensures the layout starts with 59 seconds regardless of how fast the game loaded
Destroy boxes when touching them. Lock out clicks when menus are open
If the syrup falls outside the layout, destroy it, display game over text, then restart after 2 seconds.
If syrup is on the floor (it overlaps it 10 pixels down)
When Objects are released, make it unable to pick up again
Closes menu when out of syrup
